text: <@U2Y3JHRP1|daniellee> shared a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/daniellee/F3S0J0BV3/_TLS__Problem_on_Chaincode_and_Peer_TLS_Connections|[TLS] Problem on Chaincode and Peer TLS Connections>

file.name: _TLS__Problem_on_Chaincode_and_Peer_TLS_Connections
file.title: [TLS] Problem on Chaincode and Peer TLS Connections
file.preview:
Hi everyone, I have questions on Chaincode and Peer TLS connections.

I had tried to enable Peer to Peer TLS and Peer to Membersrvc TLS on Hyperledger 0.6. I failed to start the TLS because it has troubles on self-signed certificates.

I would like to know are there any update on TLS connections using self-signed certificates on Hyperleder 1.0?

Also, how do Peer and Chaincode update CA certificates?

text: <@U2Y3JHRP1> - do you really need TLS or just trying to figure out how to do it?   I ask because as you know v0.6 is really only for development at this point and we've moved on to actively developing V1.0
